gtex_v7.overview_tooltip: Summary of evidence linking this variant to gene expression in *any* of the 44 GTEx V7 tissues. See **eQTL (GTEx V7)** tab for tissue breakdown.
gtex_v7.tab_subtitle: Evidence linking this variant to gene expression in each of the 44 GTEx V7 tissues.

sun2018.overview_tooltip: Summary of evidence linking this variant to protein abundance in blood plasma.
sun2018.tab_subtitle: Evidence linking this variant to protein abundance in Sun *et al.* (2018) pQTL data.

thurman2012.overview_tooltip: Summary of evidence linking this variant to genes using correlation of DNase I hypersensitive site and gene promoters across 125 cell and tissue types from ENCODE.
thurman2012.tab_subtitle: Evidence linking this variant to genes using correlation of DNase I hypersensitive site and gene promoters across 125 cell and tissue types from ENCODE.

andersson2014.overview_tooltip: Summary of evidence linking this variant to genes using correlation between the transcriptional activity of enhancers and transcription start sites using the FANTOM5 CAGE expression atlas.
andersson2014.tab_subtitle: Evidence linking this variant to genes using correlation between the transcriptional activity of enhancers and transcription start sites using the FANTOM5 CAGE expression atlas.

javierre2016.overview_tooltip: Summary of evidence linking this variant to genes using Promoter Capture Hi-C in *any* of the 17 human primary hematopoietic cell types
javierre2016.tab_subtitle: Evidence linking this variant to genes using Promoter Capture Hi-C in each of the 17 human primary hematopoietic cell types

vep.overview_tooltip: Most severe coding-sequence consequence(s) from Ensembl's Variant Effect Predictor
vep.tab_subtitle: Most severe coding-sequence consequence(s) from Ensembl's Variant Effect Predictor
